roleset.name: to support with evidence
roleset.note: DOCUMENT-V NOTES: VN class transcribe-25.4. (from document.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Good , who [*T*-1] documents these things as best he can [*?*], provides an official explanation in the form of a memorandum from Chief of Staff George C. Marshall to President Roosevelt : `` 1,430 pounds of ammunition , '' he wrote his commander in chief [0] [*T*-2] , were expended [*-3] on `` unidentified aircraft , '' flying at speeds as slow as 200 mph and elevations between 9,000 and 18,000 feet .

example.name: passive
example.text: [All this]-1 was recognized and documented [*-1]in the succeeding years by economists , some of whom [*T*-2] worked in the Reagan administration [*-3] to lift this burden from the American people , states and local governments .
example.arg: by economists , some of whom [*T*-2] worked in the Reagan administration [*-3]to lift this burden from the American people , states and local governments

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Her documentation of her own crimes hammered the final nail in her legal coffin.
